destinations.title: Jaipur, Rajasthan
destinations.description: Known as the Pink City, famous for palaces and forts.

destinations.title: Leh-Ladakh, Jammu & Kashmir
destinations.description: A high-desert city in the Himalayas, known for monasteries and adventure.

destinations.title: Agra, Uttar Pradesh
destinations.description: Home to the iconic Taj Mahal and Mughal architecture.

destinations.title: Ooty, TamilNadu
destinations.description: A chain of misty hills spread across a lush green carpet - with plenty to see, enjoy and experience. Ooty is much more than a visitor's paradise.

destinations.title: Udaipur, Rajasthan
destinations.description: Known as the City of Lakes, with beautiful palaces and temples.

destinations.title: Mysore, Karnataka
destinations.description: Famous for Mysore Palace, yoga, and Dussehra festival.

destinations.title: Darjeeling, West Bengal
destinations.description: A hill station known for tea gardens and the Himalayan railway.

destinations.title: Andaman and Nicobar Islands
destinations.description: Tropical islands with crystal-clear beaches and water sports.

destinations.title: Kodaikanal, Tamil Nadu
destinations.description: A charming hill station with lakes, waterfalls, and pine forests.

experiences.title: Camel Safari in Jaisalmer
experiences.description: Ride into the golden dunes of the Thar Desert.

experiences.title: Houseboat Stay in Alleppey
experiences.description: Explore Kerala's backwaters on a luxury boat.

experiences.title: Trekking in Manali
experiences.description: Enjoy adventurous treks through the Himalayan valleys.

experiences.title: Paragliding in Bir Billing
experiences.description: Soar high over the mountains in India's paragliding capital.

experiences.title: Tea Tasting in Munnar
experiences.description: Tour lush tea gardens and sample aromatic teas.

experiences.title: Scuba Diving in Havelock Island
experiences.description: Discover coral reefs and marine life underwater.

experiences.title: Skiing in Gulmarg
experiences.description: Hit the snowy slopes of Kashmir's top ski destination.

experiences.title: Desert Camping in Pushkar
experiences.description: Stay under the stars in a luxury desert camp.
